title: Blumhouse's Truth or Dare: Extended Director's Cut
writer: Michael Reisz, Jillian Jacobs, Christopher Roach
short_cast: Lucy Hale, Tyler Posey, Violett Beane, Hayden Szeto, Sophia Ali, Landon Liboiron, Nolan Gerard Funk, Sam Lerner
cast: Lucy Hale, Tyler Posey, Violett Beane, Hayden Szeto, Sophia Ali, Landon Liboiron, Nolan Gerard Funk, Sam Lerner
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16

desc: Dark fears and sinister forces collide when a group of friends play a twisted game of "Truth or Dare" in this extended version of the Blumhouse thriller.
